name: VCExperts
overview:
Only VC Experts combines rich data, powerful analytic tools, and expert commentary to give a competitive edge to private equity and venture capital professionals.

The Valuation & Deal Term Database is the most comprehensive database of venture funded company valuations and the only commercially available database to reveal the specific deal terms of a company’s financing. Both investors and entrepreneurs can use this information to negotiate better valuations and deal terms. Fund CFOs can use it to determine investment fair value in line with Topic 820 (FAS 157) reporting requirements.

The Portfolio Company Analysis Tool enables individuals to model financing & exit events in minutes. Venture capital, private equity and angel investors can use this on-line tool to model financing and exit events with a confidence they never had before. Entrepreneurs can use it to negotiate term sheets with a clear understanding of how each term affects their payout at exit time. And investment bankers, lawyers and accountants can use it to advise their clients on how to structure deals based on a quantitative analysis of likely outcomes.

The Encyclopedia of Private Equity & Venture Capital is the most comprehensive source of private equity & venture capital commentary available. Whether you are a fund manager, limited partner, entrepreneur, investment banker, lawyer, or accountant, the Encyclopedia of Private Equity & Venture Capital is the place to go for salient and up-to-date commentary on issues and trends in private equity and venture capital investing and fund management

products.name: Encyclopedia of Private Equity & Venture Capital
